definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Objective: To evaluate the correlation of Ureaplasma urealyticum(Uu) and Chlamydia trachomatis(Ct) infections with male sterility.
sentences.chinese: 目的寻找诊断特发性男性不育的生物标记分子。

sentences.english: Of the patients with idiopathic scoliosis, 38%(8 of 22) required a second irrigation and debridement.
sentences.chinese: 特发性侧弯患者中，有38%的需行二次清创引流。

sentences.english: Nursing Care of Patients with Adolescent Idiopathic Scoliosis Treated With Braces.
sentences.chinese: 支具治疗青少年特发性脊柱侧弯的护理。

sentences.english: The prognosis of IVT is good.
Essential thrombocythemia (ET) may occur in women of childbearing age.

sentences.english: Objective The study focused on the therapeutic effectiveness of abdominal acupuncture in treating idiopathic facial paralysis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究腹针治疗特发性面瘫的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Essential tremor (ET) and migraine headache are considered comorbid diseases on the basis of uncontrolled studies.
sentences.chinese: 既往非对照性研究认为，特发性震颤和偏头痛是共病。

sentences.english: Idiopathic pituitary hypofunction manifested pituitary shrinking in size and disappearing of infundibulum.
sentences.chinese: 特发性垂体功能低下表现为垂体腺小和漏斗消失。

sentences.english: To evaluate the treatment of idiopathic chondrolysis of the hip in children.

sentences.chinese: 目的寻找诊断特发性男性不育的生物标记分子。
